SENT.plain: PURPOSE: To report a case of esophageal adenocarcinoma and areas of gastric differentiation in the esophagus (Barrett esophagus) metastatic to the orbit
METHODS: A 47-year-old man with a history of esophageal carcinoma developed turgescence around his left eye
He underwent a biopsy and histologic examination of a left orbital mass
RESULTS: Histopathology of the orbital tumor was consistent with metastatic adenocarcinoma from the esophagus
CONCLUSIONS: This metastatic adenocarcinoma to the orbit likely arose in Barrett esophagus
